lines.text: Remember it all, write it down, tell it; so people will use the chance she has given them.
Will you die for him? WILL YOU DIE FOR HIM?

[Seeing the razor marks on Abby's wrists]
How can one who cared so little for life give hope to the world?
I do care. I want to try.
So much misery, man against man. They kill each other. They have no faith. I used to think the world would change. But it hasn't.
It is you, Morrell. But that was seventy years ago!
That was just yesterday to me.
